subject: job offer. [Mon, 09 Apr 2007 11:06:02 -0800]
body: Then you started to stir around so I just gave you your pills like always.       bate       dickinson ""I wonder if you could turn that typewriter around.He set the typewriter down, then rocked it up so he could fish out this new surprise. Look! The noises in the churchyard.    He had no idea if they did or not.   He also realized that wasn't the real question.  If he ran out of food before she came back, he could always return for more (like a hungry rat, right, Paulie?   That's what killing that goddamned bitch Misery was about, now that I think about it.   abater
